description: In this challenge we seek to create a drop zone, generating a comfortable visual environment for the user, improving the experience when uploading files to a web site, as a result we obtain a responsive environment, with functions to change the theme according to the schedule that facilitates reading depending on the user's taste and / or time. ## FRAMEWORKS & LIBRARYS  The project uses Bootstrap for a improvement of responsive.  ### COLORS Colors were selected by HSL Color  creating a new variable that allows with only modifying a parameter it'll create complementary colors. hsl(231, 0%, 0%) Firts parameter rest always the same,the other change. ### PRIMARY   --hue-color: 231;     --first-color: hsl(var(--hue-color), 86%, 57%); ### SECONDARY   --first-color-second: hsl(var(--hue-color), 59%, 16%); ### WHITE (CONTAINERS)   --white-smoke: hsl(15, 29%, 95%);
